text: Measure for Measure is a play by William Shakespeare. It is a comedy. Shakespeare's source may be George Whetstone's Promos and Cassandra. Measure for Measure may have been first acted on 24 December 1606. It was probably first printed in the First Folio of 1623.Measure For Measure ==References== Category:Plays by William Shakespeare Category:1600s plays
title: Measure for Measure
